ing: 1 1/2 fluid ounces anise-flavored liqueur (such as HerbsaintÂ®)
1/2 fluid ounce anisette liqueur (such as SambucaÂ®)
2 fluid ounces club soda, or more as needed
des: "This potent mixture of anise-flavored liqueurs are a classic cocktail choice for Mardi Gras parties."
ins: Fill a highball glass with crushed ice. Pour anise-flavored liqueur and anisette liqueur over ice; top with club soda. Stir to combine.
